thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Word-Of-Mouth Marketing Internship - College Sports

title: Word-Of-Mouth Marketing Internship - College Sports
text: Interns will be asked to play a role in creating an unforgettable event experience.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
